instructions:
Prepare the dry mixture:
In a large mixing bowl

combine 2 cups of flour and 1 teaspoon of salt. Mix thoroughly to evenly distribute the salt throughout the flour.

Form the dough:
Slowly pour in about 1 cup of water

while stirring the mixture with your hand or a wooden spoon. Continue adding water gradually until a rough dough starts to form.

Knead the dough:
Transfer the dough onto a clean
lightly floured surface. Knead the dough by pressing and folding it for about 8‚Äì10 minutes
until it becomes smooth and elastic. If the dough feels too sticky

sprinkle a little extra flour as needed.

Rest the dough:
Form the dough into a ball
cover it with a clean kitchen towel or plastic wrap

and let it rest for about 30 minutes. This helps the gluten relax and makes the dough easier to roll out.

Roll and shape:
After resting

divide the dough into smaller pieces. Roll out each piece with a rolling pin or pasta machine to your desired thickness. Then cut into thin strips to make spaghetti noodles.

Cook the pasta:
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the fresh spaghetti and cook for about 2‚Äì4 minutes

or until the pasta floats and is tender but still slightly firm (al dente).

Serve:
Drain the cooked pasta and immediately toss it with your favorite Carbonara sauce or any sauce of your choice. Serve hot and enjoy!

Marinate the chicken:
In a medium bowl

combine the chicken pieces with the tikka masala spice mix and yogurt. Stir well until all the chicken is evenly coated.
Cover the bowl and let the chicken marinate for at least 30 minutes (or overnight in the fridge for deeper flavor).

Cook the chicken:
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Add the marinated chicken pieces to the pan.
Cook for about 6‚Äì8 minutes

until the chicken is fully cooked and slightly browned on the outside.

Add the sauce (optional):
Once the chicken is cooked

you can add extra tikka masala sauce (store-bought or homemade) into the pan.
Simmer everything together for another 3‚Äì5 minutes until the sauce is hot and slightly thickened.

Serve:
Remove from heat.
Serve hot with rice

recipeName: Tofu Vegetable Stir Fry with Pasta
instructions: Cook the pasta and set aside
Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp
Add cooked pasta and soy sauce, toss well
Wrap with lettuce and dressing in tortilla
